content:
Who am I? #I was born in the UK, but have lived almost my whole life in New Zealand, so am definitely a Kiwi at heart!
I have a degree in Software Engineering, and my goal is to grow in this field while continuously learning and expanding my skillset. I love working in this field - it’s full of rewarding challenges and growth opportunities!
When I’m not at my computer, I am usually behind a camera. I have been successfully running my own photography business for a few years now, and this presents it’s own challenges while being a fantastic creative outlet.
More of my photography work can be seen here.My other hobbies include weightlifting and reading, and I have recently started trying my hand at running also.
My gym playlist #Get in touch
title: About Me

content:
EJ Photography #Outside of working full time, I have been successfully running my own photography business for over 4 years now.
My main focus is equestrian shows (although I’ll turn my hand to just about anything) and my brand is quite well-known in the Equestrian community across the lower North Island.
